about_the_game:
WireWalking is a wire-walking simulation game that mimics real physics. Players take on the role of acrobats, traveling around the world to undertake wire-walking challenges. Utilize skills to control stamina and balance, and become a master!
Walking between towering buildings and mountain peaks, in the midst of difficulties and despair, requires you to stay calm and brave. Through each trial, cultivate inner peace.

Features:


Based on realistic physics simulation.
Various difficulty levels to choose from.
Dozens of different costumes (providing players with different attribute bonuses).
Three stances, each with its own style. Switching them strategically can help you complete challenges more easily.

name: WireWalking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i7 7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA 1660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i9 12900
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA RTX4070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: WireWalking is a wire-walking simulation game that mimics real physics. Players take on the role of acrobats, traveling around the world to undertake wire-walking challenges. Utilize skills to control stamina and balance, and become a master!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
